nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军下属的省级军区，正军级单位，主要负责中华人民共和国首都北京的安全保卫工作，并接受中央军事委员会直接指挥。
description.en: A provincial-level military district under the PLA Ground Force, at the corps level, primarily responsible for the security of Beijing, the capital of the People's Republic of China, and under the direct command of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战力量。
description.en: The land-based service branch of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的七个大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military command and control authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，时任北京卫戍区司令员。
description.en: Major General of the PLA Ground Force, then-commander of the Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，时任北京卫戍区政治委员。
description.en: Major General of the PLA Ground Force, then-political commissar of the Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾兼任平津卫戍司令部司令员。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who concurrently served as the commander of the Peiping-Tientsin Garrison Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区的前身机构之一，由华北军区于1949年6月成立。
description.en: One of the predecessor organizations of the PLA Beijing Garrison, established by the North China Military Region in June 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期成立的大军区。
description.en: A major military region established by the People's Liberation Army during the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任北京军区兼京津卫戍区司令员。
description.en: Founding General of the PLA, who served as commander of the Beijing Military Region concurrently holding the command of the Beijing-Tianjin Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 北京卫戍区的前身机构，由平津卫戍司令部改称而来，后由北京军区兼管。
description.en: A predecessor organization of the Beijing Garrison, renamed from the Peiping-Tientsin Garrison Command, and later concurrently managed by the Beijing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 1994年9月在北京建国门地区发生的一起枪战事件。
description.en: A shooting incident that occurred in the Jianguomen area of Beijing in September 1994.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军警卫第三师十二团中尉副连长，建国门事件的制造者。
description.en: A former PLA First Lieutenant and deputy company commander of the 12th Regiment, 3rd Guard Division, who perpetrated the 1994 Jianguomen incident.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军警卫第三师

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军警卫第三师

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区下辖的师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the PLA Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于中国人民解放军警卫第三师的团级单位，因建国门事件于1996年被裁撤。
description.en: A former regiment-level unit subordinate to the PLA 3rd Guard Division, which was disbanded in 1996 due to the Jianguomen incident.

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区复兴路23号院
location.en: No. 23 Fuxing Road, Haidian District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区下辖的师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the PLA Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区直属单位。
description.en: A directly subordinate unit of the PLA Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，曾任北京卫戍区司令员，后调任陆军副司令员。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the PLA Ground Force, former commander of the Beijing Garrison, later transferred to be Deputy Commander of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国少将，曾任北京卫戍区司令员、政治委员。
description.en: Founding Major General of the PLA, served as commander and political commissar of the Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾两次担任北京卫戍区司令员。
description.en: Major General of the PLA, served as the commander of the Beijing Garrison twice.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 2016年8月，北京卫戍区由原北京军区转隶陆军总部。
description.en: In August 2016, the Beijing Garrison was transferred from the former Beijing Military Region to the command of the PLA Ground Force Headquarters.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 2016年8月前，北京卫戍区隶属于北京军区。
description.en: Before August 2016, the Beijing Garrison was subordinate to the Beijing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 北京卫戍区接受中央军事委员会直接指挥。
description.en: The Beijing Garrison receives direct command from the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 1949年6月29日，华北军区成立平津卫戍司令部。
description.en: On June 29, 1949, the North China Military Region established the Peiping-Tientsin Garrison Command.

description.zh-cn: 聂荣臻兼任平津卫戍司令部司令员。
description.en: Nie Rongzhen concurrently served as the commander of the Peiping-Tientsin Garrison Command.

description.zh-cn: 1955年4月华北军区兼京津卫戍区改称北京军区兼京津卫戍区，杨成武任司令员。
description.en: In April 1955, the North China Military Region and concurrently Beijing-Tianjin Garrison was renamed the Beijing Military Region and concurrently Beijing-Tianjin Garrison, with Yang Chengwu as commander.

description.zh-cn: 田明建在北京市区中心地带制造了建国门枪战事件。
description.en: Tian Mingjian caused the Jianguomen shooting incident in the central area of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 警卫第十二团因建国门事件于1996年被裁撤。
description.en: The 12th Guard Regiment was disbanded in 1996 as a result of the Jianguomen incident.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军警卫第三师

position.en: First Lieutenant, Deputy Company Commander of the 12th Regiment

description.zh-cn: 田明建是卫戍区下辖的警卫第三师十二团的一名中尉副连长。
description.en: Tian Mingjian was a First Lieutenant and deputy company commander in the 12th Regiment of the 3rd Guard Division, which was under the Garrison Command.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军警卫第三师
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
中国人民解放军警卫第三师
中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 2016年7月，潘良时由北京卫戍区司令员调任陆军副司令员。
description.en: In July 2016, Pan Liangshi was transferred from the position of Commander of the Beijing Garrison to Deputy Commander of the PLA Ground Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 傅崇碧曾两度担任北京卫戍区司令员。
description.en: Fu Chongbi served as the commander of the Beijing Garrison on two separate occasions.
